title: My phone is for repair. Package to send for repair gone back to sender acc to del company.
content: I am unable to talk to anyone. Looked on Google support no help and the email I have received is a no reply. I have an email that states I have paid for my repair to be carried out and the packaging for phone repair will be sent to me. however the packaging has been returned to sender acc to the delivery company so money paid but how do I get my package for my repair re delivered?
